xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 12 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <SayAsh_> has joined #phenotips 03:26 <SayAsh_> has quit 05:27 <bvancea> has joined #phenotips 06:03 <bvancea> has quit 08:57 <SayAsh_> has joined #phenotips 09:06 <SayAsh_> has quit 09:31 <allasm2> has joined #phenotips 09:59 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 10:34 <SayAsh> has quit 10:44 <Shubham> has quit 11:11 <SayAsh_> has joined #phenotips 12:52 <akats> has joined #phenotips 13:27 <akats> pushed 13:27 <sdumitriu> Thanks akats 13:43 <SayAsh_> has quit 13:56 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 15:05 <Shubham1> has quit 15:09 <SayAsh> has quit 15:11 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 15:31 <akats> are js files provided by phenotips always get loaded after the ones provided by xwiki? Or is it a race? 15:57 <bvancea> has joined #phenotips 16:21 <bvancea> hello sdumitriu 16:22 <sdumitriu> Hi bvancea 16:22 <sdumitriu> Did you start writing your application? 16:22 <bvancea> Yep 16:23 <bvancea> but I wanted to check out some issues 16:23 <bvancea> to get a feel of the architecture 16:23 <sdumitriu> OK 16:23 <bvancea> I want to finish a first day friday 16:23 <bvancea> first draft* 16:24 <bvancea> Is it ok if I send it to you for review? 16:27 <sdumitriu> Sure 16:29 <bvancea> Cool 16:29 <bvancea> I've started working on https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/774 16:29 <sdumitriu> Sounds good 16:29 <sdumitriu> Did you find the location of the code responsible for that? 16:30 <bvancea> Yup 16:30 <bvancea> I've added a new serializer class 16:30 <bvancea> in the patient-data-default-impl module 16:30 <bvancea> registered it to components.txt 16:30 <bvancea> obtained a reference to the reporting user for the patient 16:31 <bvancea> now I need to get the needed contact data 16:31 <sdumitriu> Excellent, good progress so far 16:32 <bvancea> okay, by "institution" do you mean the "company" attribute? 16:32 <bvancea> in the issue description 16:33 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:34 <bvancea> cool :D 16:34 <sdumitriu> It will be renamed to institution soon 16:34 <sdumitriu> Let me make an issue for that 16:45 <mcupak> has quit 16:53 <bvancea> btw, how do you generated the versionId for the javadoc? 16:54 <sdumitriu> It's generated automatically by git 16:54 <sdumitriu> You don't have to do anything special 16:54 <sdumitriu> For a new file, just add @version $Id$ 16:54 <sdumitriu> Git will fill it out next time you commit/checkout 16:55 <bvancea> ah, nice, thanks 17:41 <akats> changed it back to XWiki.XWikiAllGroup 17:42 <sdumitriu> akats: https://github.com/phenotips/remote-matching 17:50 <allasm2> has quit 17:52 <akats> sdumitriu: thanks 18:05 <carum> has quit 18:37 <carum> has quit 18:40 <akats> I think this is the last bit of info I need from you to start writing code 18:40 <akats> https://gist.github.com/soLEED/9518028 18:48 <allasm2> has joined #phenotips 18:51 <bvancea> Messed up issue number during commit, but amend saved everything :D 18:53 <SayAsh> has quit 18:54 <bvancea> has quit 19:04 <akats> has quit 19:06 <carum> has quit 19:59 <Shubham> has quit 19:59 <carum> has quit 20:04 <carum_> has quit 20:06 <carum> has quit 20:27 <nclandrei> has joined #phenotips 20:27 <nclandrei> hi everyone! 20:28 <sdumitriu> Hi nclandrei 20:29 <nclandrei> I am currently working on a new bug (-: 20:30 <nclandrei> regarding the configured welcome messafge 20:30 <nclandrei> message* 20:49 <allasm2> has quit 21:03 <nclandrei> has quit 21:12 <carum> has quit 21:14 <carum> has quit 21:37 <carum> has quit 21:39 <carum> has quit 22:30 <carum> has quit 23:32 <allasm2> has joined #phenotips 23:45 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 23:51 <allasm2> has quit
